summary: The sprint planning architect, Mike, proposed the first sprint SP-001 to establish a basic employee directory flow, incorporating the newly added US-015 for adding employee profiles to enable testing of search functionality in US-001, along with a mock login in US-010. The proposal outlines dependencies, testability, and alignment with MVP goals, awaiting client approval to proceed.

actions.task: Review and approve or suggest alternatives for proposed Sprint SP-001

backlog_deltas.title: Proposed Sprint: Basic Employee Directory Flow including US-010, US-015, US-001
